1323490.name: The Offering
1323490.description:
In this cooperative horror game, players are tasked with guiding a lost soul through the trials of purgatory. Players must work together to navigate a series of dark and unsettling halls, using their knowledge and intuition to overcome the terrifying obstacle that stands in their way. As they progress, they will uncover the truth behind the soul's death and the secrets of the afterlife. Can the group successfully guide the soul to redemption and escape purgatory themselves, or will they fall victim to the tortured spirit that haunts the halls?

Join forces with a group of friends to increase your chances of success as you navigate the trials of purgatory. Utilize an adaptive difficulty system that adjusts to the number of players and make strategic decisions on whether to split up or stay together to overcome obstacles.
Every moment will require decisions to be made as you race against the clock.

Choose your gear wisely as you venture through the halls. Each player can only carry one item at a time, so plan accordingly. Will you stay together and let your friend carry the torch? Or will you both find your way in the dark? The choice is yours.

Death is not the end. If you die, you will gain a crucial supporting role to ensure your friends success. Guide them through worldly interaction. Your all-seeing eye will reveal the object that the spirit wants. Use your experience as a spirit to communicate this to your friends by whatever means - through phone, spirit board, or other paranormal interactions.

Features
  • Single player, or Co-op: A randomly generated experience that can be enjoyed alone, or with up to 3 other players.
  • Various equipment: Use the equipment to pin-point the location of artifacts, increase the odds of survival, or help your fellow players.
  • Be a Ghost: Help the living players achieve their goal or haunt them until they can't take it anymore. We're bored of sitting around watching friends have fun when we die. Use your powers as a ghost to help inform players of an artifact's location or sit back and laugh as they are hunted.
  • Voice Recognition: Communicate with the spirit with voice, or through pre-defined in-game options.
  • Survival Experience: The spirit is haunting constantly, and only through communication and knowledge of the game will you be able to avoid it. Listen for the Grandfather clock, as it counts down to the witching hour, at which point, be ready to hide, or be ready to die.
  • Psychological Horror: We try to avoid jump scares, and instead rely on slow pacing, atmosphere, and sound to keep you on your toes. Though don't be fooled, she is coming for you.
